page.name: Navigation Tips
page.content:
There are two basic ways to navigate on this site effectively. They are as follows:

  • Use the bread crumb. The bread crumb trail appears horizontally at the top of the web page and provides links to each of the previous pages used to get to the current location. It allows you to click on the link to jump back to any of the previous pages. The picture below is an example of a bread crumb trail in another course.

  • Use the Navigation block.  This appears to the left.  Below is a video that explains how to use this feature.
